time:ReapTime.NAME: Reap Time
time:ReapTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, increased by the Clock.
time:ReapTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, increased by the Clock.

time:MidnightStrike.NAME: Midnight Strike
time:MidnightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at 11:00. NL Deal !D! damage.

time:TimedGuard.NAME: Timed Guard
time:TimedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Gain Block equal to the Clock.
time:TimedGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain Block equal to the Clock.

time:SandsOfTime.NAME: Sands of Time
time:SandsOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

time:GoodEvening.NAME: Good Evening
time:GoodEvening.DESCRIPTION: Cards deal double damage and grant double Block at 11:00.

time:LimitMake.NAME: Limit Make
time:LimitMake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double your Strength this turn.
